World Poker Tour

Genre: Reality-TV
Year: 2003
Country: USA
Runtime: ~45 min
Director: Steve Lipscomb
Casts: Vincent Van Patten, Mike Sexton, Melanie Iglesias and etc.

.: Plot :.
As the name suggests, the World Poker Tour features not just a single event, but a collection of prestigious tournaments played in top casinos and card rooms across the globe, including the glamorous Bellagio in Las Vegas and the Aviation Club de France in Paris. It all leads up to the WPT Championship finale where the Ã¢â‚¬Å“survivorÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ walks away with more than $1 million. But thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just a fraction of the money up for grabs over the course of the series. In March 2005 the WPT hit a $100 Million Milestone in money awarded in tournaments to participants that ranged from seasoned pros to college students. The WPT widened the television audience for poker by injecting cutting-edge television production values into the dramatic world of high-stakes, upscale, tournament poker.
